title: Example Tool
description: This is an example of a tool with all the possible options.
featured_description: This is a longer description of the example tool. It can be used to provide more details about the tool and its features.

title: Chat with a Doc
description: AI-powered Q&A over your own documents.
featured_description: Transform how you interact with documents. Upload PDFs, DOCX files, or URLs and have intelligent conversations with their content using AI-powered search.

title: Voice Notes
description: Record and manage voice notes easily in your browser with a clean interface.

title: 3D Model Viewer
description: Interactively view and manipulate 3D models directly in your browser.

title: Live Audio Transcription
description: Transcribe spoken audio into text in real-time with high accuracy.

title: VideoGen YouTube Channel
description: Explore AI-generated video content and experiments on our official channel.

title: AV Recorder
description: Easily record audio and video from your browser, ready for download.
